scarabs.name: Breach Scarab
scarabs.effect: Area contains 2 additional Breaches

scarabs.name: Breach Scarab of the Dreamer
scarabs.effect: Breaches in Area will always belong to Chayula

scarabs.name: Breach Scarab of Lordship
scarabs.effect: Breaches in Area each contain a Breachlord

scarabs.name: Breach Scarab of Splintering
scarabs.effect: Breach Monsters in Area drop 50% more Breach Splinters Clasped Hands in Area drop 50% more Breach Splinters

scarabs.name: Breach Scarab of Snares
scarabs.effect: Breaches in Area have 3 to 5 additional Clasped Hands Clasped Hands in Area are guarded by a rare Breach Monster

scarabs.name: Breach Scarab of Resonant Cascade
scarabs.effect: Breaches in Areas open and close 10% faster for each Breach already opened Monsters from Breaches in Areas have increased Difficulty and Reward for each Breach already opened

scarabs.name: Cartography Scarab of Escalation
scarabs.effect: 10% increased Maps found in Area for each Map Modifier affecting Area

scarabs.name: Cartography Scarab of Risk

scarabs.name: Cartography Scarab of Singularity

scarabs.name: Cartography Scarab of Corruption
scarabs.effect: Non-Unique Maps found in Area are Corrupted with 8 Modifiers

scarabs.name: Cartography Scarab of the Multitude
scarabs.effect: Area contains 8 to 12 additional packs of Difficult and Rewarding Monsters which drop 300% increased Maps

scarabs.name: Titanic Scarab
scarabs.effect: Unique Monsters have 1% increased Toughness, Damage, Rarity and Quantity of items dropped per 1% increased Pack Size of Area

scarabs.name: Titanic Scarab of Treasures
scarabs.effect: Unique Monsters in Area have an additional Reward Unique Monsters in Area have 30% increased Toughness

scarabs.name: Titanic Scarab of Legend
scarabs.effect: Unique Monsters in Area have 4 additional Monster Modifiers

scarabs.effect: Area contains Einhar

scarabs.name: Bestiary Scarab of Duplicating
scarabs.effect: Create a copy of Beasts captured in Area

scarabs.name: Bestiary Scarab of the Shadowed Crow
scarabs.effect: Area contains The Black MÃ³rrigan if it contains Einhar

scarabs.name: Influencing Scarab of the Shaper

scarabs.name: Influencing Scarab of the Elder
scarabs.effect: Adds Elder Influence outcome to Area

scarabs.name: Influencing Scarab of Hordes
scarabs.effect: Influenced Monster Packs in Area have 40% increased Pack Size

scarabs.name: Influencing Scarab of Conversion
scarabs.effect: Tier 14+ Maps found in Area have a chance to drop as Shaper Guardian, Elder Guardian, Conqueror or Unique Synthesised Maps instead

scarabs.name: Sulphite Scarab
scarabs.effect: Area contains Niko Map owner gains 150% more Sulphite

scarabs.name: Sulphite Scarab of Greed
scarabs.effect: Map owner gains 150% more Sulphite

scarabs.name: Sulphite Scarab of Fumes
scarabs.effect: Sulphite found in Map Area releases Enraging Fumes Monsters affected by Enraging Fumes have 50% increased Item Quantity Sulphite in your maps is guarded by Monsters from the Azurite Mine

scarabs.name: Divination Scarab of The Cloister
scarabs.effect: Area contains 8 to 12 additional packs of Doedre's Devoted Doedre's Devoted have 1% additional chance to drop a Stacked Deck

scarabs.name: Divination Scarab of Plenty
scarabs.effect: Area contains 6 to 10 additional Packs of Divination Touched Magic Monsters that have 1000% increased chance to drop Divination Cards

scarabs.name: Divination Scarab of Pilfering
scarabs.effect: Divination Cards which drop in Area are stolen by a Final Map Boss That Final Map Boss becomes more Difficult and deals increased Damage the more Divination Cards they have stolen That Final Map Boss duplicates all stolen Divination Cards when defeated

scarabs.name: Torment Scarab
scarabs.effect: Area is haunted by 3 additional Tormented Spirits Tormented Spirits in Area have a 50% chance to be set free when Possessed Monsters are slain

scarabs.name: Torment Scarab of Peculiarity
scarabs.effect: Tormented Spirits in Area are replaced with unusual variants

scarabs.name: Torment Scarab of Release
scarabs.effect: Tormented Spirits in Area have a 25% chance to be set free when Possessed Monsters are slain

scarabs.name: Torment Scarab of Possession
scarabs.effect: Rare Monsters in Area have a quarter chance to be Possessed by up to 3 Tormented Spirits

scarabs.name: Ambush Scarab
scarabs.effect: Area contains 3 additional Strongboxes

scarabs.name: Ambush Scarab of Hidden Compartments
scarabs.effect: 15% Chance for Strongboxes in Area to be openable again

scarabs.name: Ambush Scarab of Potency
scarabs.effect: 75% Increased effect of Explicit Modifiers on Strongboxes in Area

scarabs.name: Ambush Scarab of Containment
scarabs.effect: Area contains many additional Strongboxes Area's inhabitants are lying in ambush

scarabs.name: Ambush Scarab of Discernment
scarabs.effect: Strongboxes in Area are more likely to be rarer varieties

scarabs.name: Harbinger Scarab
scarabs.effect: Area contains 3 additional Harbingers

scarabs.name: Harbinger Scarab of Obelisks
scarabs.effect: Harbingers in Area spawn Empowered Obelisks Empowered Obelisks drop Currency Shards when defeated

scarabs.name: Harbinger Scarab of Regency
scarabs.effect: Harbingers in Area have a 50% chance to be replaced by a powerful Harbinger Boss

scarabs.name: Harbinger Scarab of Warhoards
scarabs.effect: Currency shards dropped by Harbingers in Area are duplicated

scarabs.name: Expedition Scarab

scarabs.effect: Expedition Encounters in Area have 50% increased number of Explosives 80% increased Explosive Radius

scarabs.name: Expedition Scarab of the Skald
scarabs.effect: Expedition Encounters in Area are lead by Dannig

scarabs.name: Expedition Scarab of Archaeology
scarabs.effect: Remnants in Expedition Encounters in Area have 2 additional Suffixes and Prefixes

scarabs.name: Legion Scarab

scarabs.name: Legion Scarab of The Sekhema
scarabs.effect: Legion Encounters in Area always contain the Maraketh Faction

scarabs.name: Legion Scarab of Eternal Conflict
scarabs.effect: Legion Monsters in Area can be broken out of Stasis multiple times Legion Monsters in Area gain increased Difficulty and Reward for each time they are broken out

scarabs.name: Abyss Scarab
scarabs.effect: Area contains an additional Abyss

scarabs.name: Abyss Scarab of Multitudes
scarabs.effect: Abysses in Area spawn 50% increased Monsters

scarabs.name: Abyss Scarab of Edifice
scarabs.effect: Abysses in Area that do not lead to an Abyssal Depths lead to a Stygian Spire Abyss pits in Area that do not lead to an Abyssal Depths or spawn an Abyssal Trove will spawn Minor Stygian Spires

scarabs.name: Abyss Scarab of Emptiness
scarabs.effect: Rare Abyss Monsters in Area have a 50% chance to drop an additional Rare item with an Abyssal socket

scarabs.name: Abyss Scarab of Profound Depth
scarabs.effect: Monsters from Abysses in Areas have increased Difficulty and Reward for each prior Pit in that Abyss

scarabs.name: Anarchy Scarab
scarabs.effect: Area contains 4 additional Rogue Exiles

scarabs.name: Anarchy Scarab of Gigantification
scarabs.effect: Wild Rogue Exiles in Area have a 30% chance to be replaced with a Rogue Giant

scarabs.name: Anarchy Scarab of Partnership
scarabs.effect: Wild Rogue Exiles in Area have a 50% chance to appear in pairs

scarabs.name: Essence Scarab
scarabs.effect: Area contains 2 additional Imprisoned Monsters

scarabs.name: Essence Scarab of Ascent
scarabs.effect: Essences found in Area are a tier higher

scarabs.name: Essence Scarab of Stability
scarabs.effect: Corrupting an Essence in Area can only result in upgrading or transforming Essences

scarabs.name: Essence Scarab of Calcification
scarabs.effect: Rare monsters that are natural inhabitants of the Area are imprisoned by Essences

scarabs.name: Essence Scarab of Adaptation
scarabs.effect: Imprisoned Monsters released in Areas grant a random Essence Modifier to another Imprisoned Monster in the Area Imprisoned Monsters in Areas have increased Difficulty and Reward for each Essence Modifier

scarabs.name: Domination Scarab
scarabs.effect: Area contains 2 additional Shrines

scarabs.name: Domination Scarab of Apparitions
scarabs.effect: Area contains 2 additional Apparition Shrines

scarabs.name: Domination Scarab of Evolution
scarabs.effect: Area contains an additional Evolving Shrine

scarabs.name: Domination Scarab of Terrors
scarabs.effect: Shrines in Area are guarded by an Atlas Boss Modifiers to the Final Map Boss also apply to these Atlas Bosses

scarabs.name: Ritual Scarab of Selectiveness
scarabs.effect: Rerolling Favours at Ritual Altars in Area has no cost the first 2 times Ritual Altars in Area allow rerolling Favours 1 additional time

scarabs.name: Ritual Scarab of Wisps
scarabs.effect: Ritual Altars in Area spawn a Wildwood Wisp Wildwood Wisps grant 100% increased Tribute Gained to nearby Players

scarabs.name: Ritual Scarab of Abundance
scarabs.effect: Rituals in Area offer 100% increased Favours

scarabs.name: Harvest Scarab
scarabs.effect: Area contains the Sacred Grove

scarabs.name: Harvest Scarab of Doubling
scarabs.effect: Lifeforce dropped by Harvest Monsters in Area is duplicated Harvest Monsters in Area have 100% more Life

scarabs.name: Harvest Scarab of Cornucopia
scarabs.effect: If Area contains the Sacred Grove, it will contain up to 1 additional Tier 4 seed of each type, if possible

scarabs.name: Incursion Scarab
scarabs.effect: Area contains Alva

scarabs.name: Incursion Scarab of Invasion
scarabs.effect: Area contains 12 to 16 additional packs of Incursion Monsters

scarabs.name: Incursion Scarab of Champions
scarabs.effect: Incursions in Area have a 35% chance for all Monsters to be at least Magic Incursions in Area have 15% increased Pack Size

scarabs.name: Incursion Scarab of Timelines
scarabs.effect: Final Architect slain in Area will drop an Itemised Temple Itemised Temples dropped in Area are generated based on current Temple layout, but with randomised room tiers

scarabs.name: Betrayal Scarab
scarabs.effect: Area contains Jun

scarabs.name: Betrayal Scarab of the Allflame
scarabs.effect: 75% Increased number of Monster Packs Substituted by Allflame Embers in Area

scarabs.name: Betrayal Scarab of Reinforcements
scarabs.effect: Immortal Syndicate Members in Area have 50% increased chance to be accompanied by reinforcements

scarabs.name: Betrayal Scarab of Perpetuation
scarabs.effect: Defeated Immortal Syndicate targets in Area have a 50% chance to drop an additional Scarab

scarabs.name: Beyond Scarab
scarabs.effect: Slaying enemies close together in Area can attract monsters from Beyond this realm

scarabs.name: Beyond Scarab of Corruption
scarabs.effect: Items dropped by Beyond Demons in Area are Corrupted

scarabs.name: Beyond Scarab of Haemophilia
scarabs.effect: Beyond Portals in Area have 50% increased Merging Radius Characters that Kill Beyond Rare Monsters in Area have a 30% chance to gain their Modifiers for 20 seconds

scarabs.name: Beyond Scarab of Resurgence
scarabs.effect: Beyond Bosses in Area are enraged on low life Beyond Bosses in Area drop 100% increased Tainted Currency Beyond Portals in Area have 30% increased chance to spawn a Unique Boss

scarabs.name: Beyond Scarab of the Invasion
scarabs.effect: Rare and Unique Monsters slain in Area create 8 to 12 additional Beyond Portals

scarabs.name: Ultimatum Scarab
scarabs.effect: Area contains an Ultimatum Encounter

scarabs.name: Ultimatum Scarab of Bribing
scarabs.effect: Ultimatum Monsters grant 150% increased Experience Ultimatum Encounters grant rewards as though you completed 2 additional Rounds

scarabs.name: Ultimatum Scarab of Dueling
scarabs.effect: Ultimatum Encounters in Area will always lead to a Unique Boss if possible

scarabs.name: Ultimatum Scarab of Catalysing
scarabs.effect: Ultimatum Encounters in Area will only offer Catalysts as Rewards to the Map Owner

scarabs.name: Ultimatum Scarab of Inscription
scarabs.effect: Ultimatum Encounter rewards in Area offering Catalysts will offer Inscribed Ultimatums to the Map Owner instead

scarabs.name: Delirium Scarab
scarabs.effect: Area contains a Mirror of Delirium

scarabs.name: Delirium Scarab of Mania
scarabs.effect: Delirium Reward Meters fill 100% faster in Area Delirium in Area increases 50% faster with distance from the mirror

scarabs.name: Delirium Scarab of Paranoia
scarabs.effect: Delirium Encounters in Area generate 2 additional Reward types

scarabs.name: Delirium Scarab of Neuroses
scarabs.effect: Delirium Encounters in Area contain all Unique Delirium Bosses Can only be used with Tier 11+ Maps

scarabs.name: Delirium Scarab of Delusions
scarabs.effect: Maps found in Area have layers of Delirium

scarabs.name: Blight Scarab
scarabs.effect: Area contains a Blight Encounter

scarabs.name: Blight Scarab of Bounty
scarabs.effect: Blight Chests in Area have a 20% chance to be openable again

scarabs.name: Blight Scarab of the Blightheart
scarabs.effect: Blight Encounters in Area have one Blighted Chest Blight Encounters in Area spawn many more waves of Enemies Blighted Chests in Area grow larger and more rewarding the more Blighted Enemies are slain

scarabs.name: Blight Scarab of Blooming
scarabs.effect: Blight Encounters in Area have up to 3 additional Unique Bosses Unique enemies in Blight Encounters have 100% increased life Tier 14+ Blighted Maps found in Area drop as Blight-Ravaged Maps instead

scarabs.name: Blight Scarab of Invigoration
scarabs.effect: Each Empowering Tower in Areas grants Blighted Monsters in range increased Difficulty and Reward

scarabs.name: Kalguuran Scarab

scarabs.name: Kalguuran Scarab of Refinement
scarabs.effect: Ore Deposits in Area grant Smelted Bars instead of Marking Ore

scarabs.name: Scarab of Monstrous Lineage
scarabs.effect: 40% increased Magic Pack Size

scarabs.name: Scarab of Adversaries
scarabs.effect: Area contains 4 additional Packs with Mirrored Rare Monsters

scarabs.name: Scarab of Divinity
scarabs.effect: Up to 3 additional Rare Monsters in Area will be Pantheon-Touched Apparitions spawned by Pantheon-Touched Monsters deal 100% increased damage

scarabs.name: Scarab of Hunted Traitors
scarabs.effect: Area contains Hunted Traitors

scarabs.name: Scarab of Stability
scarabs.effect: Portals to Area have a 50% chance to not be consumed on use

scarabs.effect: Grants an additional Kirac Mission on Map Completion

scarabs.name: Scarab of Evolution
scarabs.effect: 10 Monster Packs in Area are upgraded to Magic

scarabs.name: Scarab of Wisps
scarabs.effect: Monsters in Area have a chance to be Empowered by 2000 Wildwood Wisps

scarabs.name: Scarab of Bisection
scarabs.effect: You can select the Nullify Prefixes or Nullify Suffixes crafting options on the Map Device

scarabs.name: Scarab of Unity
scarabs.effect: All Magic Monsters in Area are in a Union of Souls Monsters in Area get 1% more Rarity of items dropped for each Empowered Soul, up to 500%

scarabs.name: Scarab of Radiant Storms
scarabs.effect: Area contains a Resplendent Tempest

scarabs.name: Horned Scarab of Bloodlines
scarabs.effect: Area has 150% increased Magic Monsters Magic Monsters in area have an additional Modifier

scarabs.name: Horned Scarab of Nemeses
scarabs.effect: Rare Monsters in Area have 2 additional Modifiers

scarabs.name: Horned Scarab of Preservation
scarabs.effect: Other Scarabs are not consumed on use

scarabs.name: Horned Scarab of Awakening
scarabs.effect: You can select one Imbued crafting option on the Map Device

scarabs.name: Horned Scarab of Tradition
scarabs.effect: All Rare and Unique Monsters in Area have dropped items transformed by a Reward Modifier

scarabs.name: Horned Scarab of Glittering
scarabs.effect: Players in Area gain increased Item Rarity for each Monster slain, up to 400%, decaying over time

scarabs.name: Horned Scarab of Pandemonium
